text: The San Diego Zoo is a zoo in Balboa Park, San Diego, California. It is one of the largest zoos in the world with over 4,000 animals of more than 800 species. It is one of the few places in Southern California to feature an arctic landscape.Travel Guide to the San Diego Zoo ==References== Category:Zoos in California Category:Buildings and structures in San Diego Category:1915 establishments in the United States
title: San Diego Zoo
